entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Barry's Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:04 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of snow beginning near noon. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming south 20 km/h early this afternoon. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 42 this morning and minus 20 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023
